remarks: This theorem derives ~ ax-dc using ~ ax-ac and ~ ax-inf .  Thus, _AC_ implies _DC_, but not vice-versa (so that ZFC is strictly stronger than ZF+DC).  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jan-2013.)
statement:
axdc $p |- ( ( E. y E. z y x z /\ ran x C_ dom x ) -> E. f A. n e. _om ( f ` n ) x ( f ` suc n ) ) $.
$d f n x y z $.
